body: Plate 15-20x10<sup>3</sup> cells per coverslip \(12 mm diameter) 2 days before the oligofection.
Mix 175μl Optimem + 1-10μl siRNA oligos \(200 nM ) per coverslip.
Mix 11μl Optimem + 4μl Oligofectamine per coverslip and leave for 7 minutes.
During the incubation time, change the medium of senescent cells: remove old medium and add 800μl Optimem per coverslip.
to senescent cells already in 800μl Optimem.
Leave cells in the incubator for at least 4 hours.
Without removing the Optimem medium, add 1ml of medium used to culture the senescent cells without antibiotics with 20% FCS or FBS.
